long_description: we specialise in hiring portable toilets to all sectors of the events industry. castlewood loo hire have successfully hired portable toilet units to events such as:-. based in the heart of county durham we are able to supply portable toilets around the northumberland, co. durham, teesside, tyne & wear, cleveland and north yorkshire areas. castlewood hire also hire p.a. tannoy systems for outdoor events. each portable loo is entirely self-contained, fully flushing, de-odorised and equipped with loo rolls, anti-bacterial hand-wash and fresh water sinks. castlewood loo hire is based in the north east of england. castlewood portable toilet hire operates throughout the north east covering the durham, newcastle, sunderland, northumberland, darlington, washington, middlesbrough, stockton, hartlepool and richmond area.
